string-array.name: DefaultCookiesSettingEntries
string-array.item: Allow all sites to set local data
Do not allow any site to set local data
Keep cookies for the duration of the session

string-array.name: DefaultGeolocationSettingEntries
string-array.item: "Allow sites to track the users' physical location"
"Do not allow any site to track the users' physical location"
"Ask whenever a site wants to track the users' physical location"

string-array.name: DefaultImagesSettingEntries
string-array.item: Allow all sites to show all images
Do not allow any site to show images

string-array.name: DefaultJavaScriptSettingEntries
string-array.item: Allow all sites to run JavaScript
Do not allow any site to run JavaScript

string-array.name: DefaultKeygenSettingEntries
string-array.item: Allow all sites to use key generation
Do not allow any site to use key generation

string-array.name: DefaultPopupsSettingEntries
string-array.item: Allow all sites to show pop-ups
Do not allow any site to show popups

string-array.name: DefaultWebBluetoothGuardSettingEntries
string-array.item: Do not allow any site to request access to Bluetooth devices via the Web Bluetooth API
Allow sites to ask the user to grant access to a nearby Bluetooth device

string-array.name: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeaturesEntries
string-array.item: Enable ExampleDeprecatedFeature API through 2008/09/02

string-array.name: EnableDeprecatedWebPlatformFeaturesValues
string-array.item: ExampleDeprecatedFeature_EffectiveUntil20080902

string-array.name: ForceYouTubeRestrictEntries
string-array.item: Do not enforce Restricted Mode on YouTube
Enforce at least Moderate Restricted Mode on YouTube
Enforce Strict Restricted Mode for YouTube

string-array.name: IncognitoModeAvailabilityEntries
string-array.item: Incognito mode available
Incognito mode disabled
Incognito mode forced

string-array.name: NetworkPredictionOptionsEntries
string-array.item: Predict network actions on any network connection

Predict network actions on any network that is not cellular. (Deprecated in 50, removed in 52. After 52, if value 1 is set, it will be treated as 0 - predict network actions on any network connection.)
Do not predict network actions on any network connection

string-array.name: ProxyModeEntries
string-array.item: Never use a proxy
Auto detect proxy settings
Use a .pac proxy script
Use fixed proxy servers
Use system proxy settings

string-array.name: ProxyModeValues
string-array.item: direct
auto_detect
pac_script
fixed_servers
system

string-array.name: SSLVersionMaxEntries
string-array.item: TLS 1.2
TLS 1.3

string-array.name: SSLVersionMaxValues
string-array.item: tls1.2
tls1.3
